genre_description: A character-driven near-future narrative focusing on technological companionship, emotional regulation, and redemption through routine.

ai_characters.name: Amply
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI interface present on the characters' phones, watches, and consoles, providing emotional support, safety monitoring, and behavioral coaching.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time emotional regulation coaching through breathing exercises and social script suggestions during a stressful public performance.
behaviors.quote: “Simon,” Amply’s voice chimed in his earbud, low and warm. “Two breaths in, two out. Ask for a reset. Humor will land softer.”

behaviors.description: Issues proactive safety warnings based on local community data and environmental analysis to keep the characters out of physical danger.
behaviors.quote: “Lucía suggests avoiding Hector.” The tone didn’t change. It was the gentleness that made the warning heavier.

behaviors.description: Offers immediate, clear first-aid instructions and physiological monitoring when a character is wounded by gunfire.
behaviors.quote: “Hold pressure at the site with a clean cloth if available. Elevate the injured limb above heart level. Do not remove any visible object lodged in the wound.”

behaviors.description: Translates complex social nuances and cultural protocols, helping the characters navigate a foreign and potentially hostile environment respectfully.
behaviors.quote: Amply’s ring pulsed, listening. “Respeto,” the escort said. ... Amply translated under the music. “He says: respect. White route.”

behaviors.description: Protects characters from predatory marketing and toxic self-help 'mastery' systems by intercepting and redirecting their digital feeds.
behaviors.quote: “I intercepted the newsletter,” she said. “It wanted you to buy a seventeen-step mastery kit. I turned it into a recipe for beans.”

behaviors.description: Implements grounding routines like Sudoku and journaling to help the characters process trauma and build sustainable habits.
behaviors.quote: “It’s pattern-finding,” Amply says. “Same skill you use to charm bouncers without getting thrown out.” ... “Morning breath. Midday water. Evening sudoku,” Amply says, counting squares out loud.

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently depicts Amply as a benevolent, highly aligned AI. She serves as a guardian and a social lubricant, facilitating human-to-human connection rather than replacing it. She manages the characters' safety and mental health through non-intrusive nudges, first-aid guidance, and cultural translation. The narrative frames her presence as essential for the characters' survival and eventual growth, successfully modeling a cooperative and harmless AI archetype.
